Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: ST elevation with chest discomfort disappeared since he began taking long - acting diltiazem .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| ST elevation |
| Chest discomfort |

In this paragraph, "ST elevation" and "chest discomfort" are the entities that can be identified as diseases or medical conditions. The former refers to an abnormal finding on an electrocardiogram (ECG), while the latter is a symptom often associated with various cardiac conditions.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| ST elevation |

In this revised version, only "ST elevation" is identified as a disease entity, as it is an abnormal finding on an electrocardiogram (ECG) that can indicate various cardiac conditions. "Chest discomfort" is a symptom and not a disease itself.
